title: Looking for T213s: Camnitz, Quinn, Wiltse
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: Looking for T213s: Camnitz, Quinn, Wiltse
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for the following T213s:

Type 2:
Camnitz, arms above head, Pittsburgh Fed
Quinn, Baltimore Fed
Quinn, Vernon
Wiltse portrait w/cap, New York Nat
Wiltse portrait w/cap, Brooklyn Fed

Type 3:
Geo. Wiltse

If you have any of these and might be willing to part with them, or know anybody who has them, please let me know, either by PM or by e-mail at [url]dkathman@uchicago.edu[/url]. Thanks.

Ed Hans had a nice stack of graded T213-2's and another stack of raw T213-2's at the National.  

Good luck!  Rick
